1. Town Council

Town Council
============

The Town of Prosper is a Home Rule Town with a Mayor and six Council Members who are elected at large for three-year terms.



1. ![Mayor Bristol - web small](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3354 "Mayor Bristol - web small")

   #### David F. Bristol

   Mayor

1. ![Amy Bartley](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3349 "Amy Bartley")

   #### Amy Bartley

   Mayor Pro-Tem, Place 3



1. ![Chris Kern (2) _web](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4684 "Chris Kern (2) _web")

   #### Chris Kern

   Deputy Mayor Pro-Tem, Place 4

1. ![Marcus Ray - web small](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3353 "Marcus Ray - web small")

   #### Marcus E. Ray



1. ![Craig Andres -  web small](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3402 "Craig Andres -  web small")

   #### Craig Andres



1. ![Jeff Hodges](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=277 "Jeff Hodges")

   #### Jeff Hodges



1. ![Cameron Reeves 2024_web](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3817 "Cameron Reeves 2024_web")

   #### Cameron Reeves

* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month

* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month

### Watch Town Council Meetings

Prosper Town Council meetings are
streamed live online
and available to re-watch. Meeting videos are posted no later than 48 hours after a meeting.

The public is invited to address the Town Council on any topic; however, the Council is unable to take action on any topic not listed on the agenda. Please fill out a
Public Comment Request Form
and submit it to the Town Secretary prior to 4 pm on the day of the meeting.
